{%- capture dataTypeWorkspace %} {% assign result = "" %} {% assign value = include.value %} {% assign firstCharJson = value | jsonify | slice: 0 %} {% if value == nil or firstCharJson == "null" %} {% assign result = "null" %} {% elsif firstCharJson == '"' %} {% assign result = "string" %} {% elsif firstCharJson == '[' %} {% assign result = "array" %} {% elsif firstCharJson == '{' %} {% assign result = "object" %} {% elsif firstCharJson == 't' or firstCharJson == 'f' %} {% assign result = "boolean" %} {% else %} {% assign result = "number" %} {% endif %} {% endcapture -%}{{- result -}}
